a.
```{r}
data1 = read.table("http://www.stat.umn.edu/~gary/book/fcdae.data/ex3.1",header=TRUE)

mu1 = mean(data1[which(data1$diet==1),]$y)

mu3 = mean(data1[which(data1$diet==3),]$y)
mu4 = mean(data1[which(data1$diet==4),]$y)
a1 = mu1 - mu
a2 = mu2 - mu
a3 = mu3 - mu
a4 = mu4 - mu

mu

# treatment effects
a1
a2
a3
a4
```
